response:
Have you recently installed any addons for ProjectKorra? These may be causing issues.

If it is the addon, it is probably outdated. Try remove the addon for now and contact the author about updating it.

If you haven't installed any addons, please post the error that is in your console log. This will help support pick out exactly what is the issue. You can find this within the `/logs/latest.log` file of your server.
